name: informatory

providing information: This website is purely informatory in nature and does not seek to offer any judgements or opinions. The DVD is accompanied by a small informatory booklet.
More examplesFewer examplesOne of the jobs of the ambassador was to prepare informatory notes and send them to the Foreign Office. The accident report recommended that there should be more warning signs on the road and fewer informatory signs.The HR department sent informatory emails to employees setting out for positions overseas.
